abstract: A day after signing a $1.2 billion deal to buy a Norwegian search company, Fast Search and Transfer, Microsoft confirmed that Bruce Jaffe, the firm’s mergers and acquisitions architect, will be leaving the company at the end of February.
lead_paragraph: A day after signing a $1.2 billion deal to buy a Norwegian search company, Fast Search and Transfer, Microsoft confirmed that Bruce Jaffe, the firm’s mergers and acquisitions architect, will be leaving the company at the end of February.

abstract: Shares in the Swiss-based computer peripherals maker Logitech International rose more than 12 percent on Thursday amid speculation Microsoft would make a takeover bid, traders told Reuters. Spokesmen for Logitech, the world’s largest maker of computer mice, and Microsoft were not immediately reachable for comment.
lead_paragraph: Shares in the Swiss-based computer peripherals maker Logitech International rose more than 12 percent on Thursday amid speculation Microsoft would make a takeover bid, traders told Reuters. Spokesmen for Logitech, the world’s largest maker of computer mice, and Microsoft were not immediately reachable for comment.

headline.main: Logitech Shares Jump on Microsoft Bid Rumors
